fn.p: Competing Interests: The authors have declared that no competing interests exist.

Funding: This work was funded by NSF (Grant #EF-0436318 to JPS) and partially conducted while a Sabbatical Fellow at the National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis, a Center funded by NSF (Grant #DEB-0553768), the University of California, Santa Barbara, and the State of California. The funders did not play any role in the design and conduct of the study, in the collection, analysis, and interpretation of the data, nor in the preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript.
